quote: To entertain a group, you don't have to join that group!

intro.title: Started by Eliminating What I Didn't Like
intro.description:
It started by choosing a department during high school, not because I liked or was interested in computers.
But because other departments have the impression of playing around in a place that I think is not clean.

intro.title: There is Always Free Time in a Busy Life
intro.description:
A lot of time is used doing work as Unity Developer, learn about Laravel, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, and business.
Also weightlifting, badminton, and swimming. Playing my favorite PC games, eFootball PES 2021.
